name: Crozy & Herbest
description:
CROZY & HERBEST - CLEANING UP NUTOPIA

Gather material for the drey in the tree and score points by putting all the trash in the bin! 

Winter is close so prepare and make a nice cozy drey by using good materials. Eat nuts to gain speed back.

Play solo or in split-screen coop!

Have fun!

"F" for fullscreen

Controls:

Player 1:

W A S D - Move

C - Pickup / Drop

Hold C - Throw

SPACE - Eat nuts

Player 2:

ARROW KEYS - Move

MINUS - Pickup / Drop

Hold MINUS - Throw

PERIOD - Eat nuts
